name: Thin Ice
tagline: A dishonest insurance salesman's life quickly disintegrates during a Wisconsin winter when he teams up with a psychopath to steal a rare violin at the home of a reclusive farmer.

name: Omkara
tagline: Shakespeare's masterpiece "Othello" set in modern India. A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity.

name: Cabeza de Vaca
tagline: A handful of survivors from a disastrous 1528 Spanish expedition to Florida journey across the coast until they reach Mexico.

name: Only Lovers Left Alive
tagline: A depressed musician reunites with his lover, though their romance - which has already endured several centuries - is disrupted by the arrival of uncontrollable younger sister.

name: The Last Mistress
tagline: Secrets, rumors and betrayals surround the upcoming marriage between a young dissolute man and virtuous woman of the French aristocracy.

name: Up the Yangtze
tagline: At the edge of the Yangtze River, not far from the Three Gorges Dam, young men and women take up employment on a cruise ship, where they confront rising waters and a radically changing China.

name: The Boys Are Back
tagline: A sports writer becomes a single parent in tragic circumstances.

name: Ready
tagline: Set in Thailand and India, a case of mistaken identity leads to love; and a man and his family concoct a grand scheme to win over the hearts of a woman and her greedy conniving uncles.

name: All I Wanna Do
tagline: In the 1960s, a group of friends at an all girls school learn that their school is going to be combined with a nearby all boys school. They concoct a plan to save their school while dealing with everyday problems along the way.

name: Chasing Ice
tagline: Follow National Geographic photographer James Balog across the Arctic as he deploys time-lapse cameras designed for one purpose: to capture a multi-year record of the world's changing glaciers.

name: Only God Forgives
tagline: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.

name: Listen Up: The Lives of Quincy Jones
tagline: A unique look at the legendary musician, arranger, composer and producer offers a collage of memories, sounds and intimate interviews with musical greats in a rousing showcase.

name: Stage Beauty
tagline: A female theatre dresser creates a stir and sparks a revolution in seventeenth century London theatre by playing Desedmona in Othello. But what will become of the male actor she once worked for and eventually replaced?

name: The Winter Guest
tagline: A recent widow who is determined to leave Scotland for Australia with her son gets an unexpected visit from her aging mother.

name: To Be and to Have
tagline: A documentary portrait of a one-room school in rural France, where the students (ranging in age from 4 to 11) are educated by a single dedicated teacher.

name: New Waterford Girl
tagline: A gifted teenager, dreaming of life beyond her small town, becomes inspired when a 15-year-old girl from New York moves in next door.

name: Heaven
tagline: A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer.

name: Shy People
tagline: New York journalist visits her distant cousin for the first time to write an article about her hard life in the bayous of Louisiana. Journalist's wild drug addicted daughter just adds to tensions between two families' cultures.

name: Passion of Mind
tagline: A psychological romantic thriller where fantasy and reality become indistinguishable for a woman leading a double life in her dreams.

name: Bloody Sunday
tagline: A dramatization of the Irish civil rights protest march and subsequent massacre by British troops on January 30, 1972.

name: Young Adam
tagline: A young drifter working on a river barge disrupts his employers' lives while hiding the fact that he knows more about a dead woman found in the river than he admits.

name: The Ten
tagline: Ten stories, each inspired by one of the ten commandments.

name: The Sum of Us
tagline: A widowed father has to deal with two complex issues: while he is searching for "Miss Right," his son, who is in his 20s and gay, is searching for "Mr. Right."

name: Particle Fever
tagline: Physicists are on the cusp of the greatest scientific discovery of all time -- or perhaps their greatest failure.

name: Personal Velocity: Three Portraits
tagline: Three women's escapes from their afflicted lives. Each struggles to flee from the men who confine their personal freedom.

name: Strapless
tagline: An expatriate American doctor in London allows herself to lighten up when her freewheeling younger sister and a mysterious man enter her life. Her inhibitions released, the beautiful doctor learns that freedom has its own price.

name: The Statement
tagline: Tale of a former Nazi executioner who becomes a target of hit men and Police investigators.

name: Pariah
tagline: A Brooklyn teenager juggles conflicting identities and risks friendship, heartbreak, and family in a desperate search for sexual expression.

name: Coriolanus
tagline: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

name: Peepli (Live)
tagline: An impoverished farmer's threat to end his life invites attention from politicians and media.

name: The Devil's Backbone
tagline: After Carlos, a 12-year-old whose father has died in the Spanish Civil War, arrives at an ominous boy's orphanage he discovers the school is haunted and has many dark secrets that he must uncover.

name: Kurbaan
tagline: A woman finds that her neighbors are terrorists, and her husband is not who he claims to be.

name: Billu
tagline: Based on the story of friendship between Krishna and Sudama.

name: Irreversible
tagline: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.

name: Until the End of the World
Lakshya
tagline: When taken out of comfort zone, pampered young man Karan faces the reality of having goalless life.

name: Nights of Cabiria
tagline: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

production.name: Instituto Cubano del Arte e Industrias Cinematográficos (ICAIC)

name: Defense of the Realm
tagline: After a newspaper reporter helps expose a Member of Parliament as a possible spy, he finds that there's much more to the story than that.

name: The Great Buck Howard
tagline: A young man, much to the chagrin of his father, becomes the new assistant to an illusionist in decline.

name: Pokémon Heroes
tagline: Two thieves take control of an ancient weapon designed to defend the canal city of Altomare.

name: Cosmopolis
tagline: Riding across Manhattan in a stretch limo in order to get a haircut, a 28-year-old billionaire asset manager's day devolves into an odyssey with a cast of characters that start to tear his world apart.

name: Sister, Sister
tagline: Two sisters turn their family mansion in Louisiana into a guest house. One of their guests is an aide to a congressman, and turns their lives inside out.

name: Ask the Dust
tagline: Mexican beauty Camilla hopes to rise above her station by marrying a wealthy American. That is complicated by meeting Arturo Bandini, a first-generation Italian hoping to land a writing career and a blue-eyed blonde on his arm.

name: Army of Shadows
tagline: A account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

name: The Edge of Heaven
tagline: A Turkish man travels to Istanbul to find the daughter of his father's former girlfriend.

name: Nymphomaniac: Vol. I
tagline: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.

name: First Descent
tagline: Five of the world's best snowboarders are taken to the mountains of Alaska for some outrageous "Big Mountain" rides.

name: The Man Who Cried
tagline: A young refugee traveling from Russia to America in search of her lost father falls for a gypsy horseman.

name: Rosencrantz & Guildenstern Are Dead
tagline: Two minor characters from the play, "Hamlet" stumble around unaware of their scripted lives and unable to deviate from them.

name: And Now... Ladies and Gentlemen...
tagline: A jazz singer and a British jewel thief are brought together by their mutual desire to forget the past.

name: Kadosh
tagline: Two sisters become victims of the patriarchal, ultra-orthodox society.

name: Faithless
tagline: An imaginary woman recollects the painful experience of adultery to a storyteller.

name: Black
tagline: The cathartic tale of a deaf, mute and blind girl, and her teacher who brings a ray of light into her world of BLACK.

name: The Shape of Things
tagline: Quiet, unassuming Adam is changing in a major way, thanks to his new girlfriend, art student Evelyn. Adam's friends are a little freaked by the transformation.

name: Rosenstrasse
tagline: After the death of her father, Hannah becomes concerned with the strange behavior of her mother. As her mother's troubled childhood is revealed, Hannah realizes how little she ever knew.

name: Kiss or Kill
tagline: After a robbery scam that goes bad, lovers Nikki and Al take off into the Australian outback, pursued by the police and a malevolent footballer named Zipper Doyle, and meet a number of offbeat characters.

name: Rendezvous in Paris
tagline: Three stories of love and coincidence around the theme of dates in Paris.

name: Fade to Black
tagline: Filmed during his "Black Album" era, Jay-Z looks back on his career as one of rap music's most successful emcees and entrepreneurs.

name: Donnie Darko
tagline: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

name: Mausam
tagline: A war, religious conflicts, and misunderstandings create obstacles for a couple of different faiths.

name: Vampire's Kiss
tagline: After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.

name: Man Facing Southeast
tagline: A patient in a mental hospital claims to be an extraterrestial. Could he be right?

name: Middle Men
tagline: Chronicles Jack Harris, one of the pioneers of internet commerce, as he wrestles with his morals and struggles not to drown in a sea of conmen, mobsters, drug addicts, and pornstars.

name: Nueba Yol 3: Bajo la nueva ley
